definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: He said the Afghan government threatened him with expulsion.
sentences.chinese: 他說，阿富汗政府還以驅逐令威脅過他。

sentences.english: One of the settlers, *, berated police carrying out the evictions.
sentences.chinese: 其中一名定居者譴責警察的驅逐令。

sentences.english: He is fighting an eviction order in court.
sentences.chinese: 他正通過法庭對驅逐令表示反對。
